Posts.EditableText:
Hi, I'm getting the following run time error when I try to play my game. It was posted 12 Jul 2020 and last updated on 10 Sep 2020. I was also able to play it as early as yesterday. Just wondering if anybody know what I could do? Anyways, below is the message I get. Thank you



Server Error in '/' Application.
Runtime Error
Description: An application error occurred on the server. The current custom error settings for this application prevent the details of the application error from being viewed remotely (for security reasons). It could, however, be viewed by browsers running on the local server machine.

Details: To enable the details of this specific error message to be viewable on remote machines, please create a <customErrors> tag within a "web.config" configuration file located in the root directory of the current web application. This <customErrors> tag should then have its "mode" attribute set to "Off".

<!-- Web.Config Configuration File -->

<configuration>
    <system.web>
        <customErrors mode="Off"/>
    </system.web>
</configuration>

Notes: The current error page you are seeing can be replaced by a custom error page by modifying the "defaultRedirect" attribute of the application's <customErrors> configuration tag to point to a custom error page URL.

<!-- Web.Config Configuration File -->

<configuration>
    <system.web>
        <customErrors mode="RemoteOnly" defaultRedirect="mycustompage.htm"/>
    </system.web>
</configuration>

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

It did that to me a few times yesterday and the day before when playing online.

I refreshed the page after it did it. Got the error two or three times, refreshed the page each time, then the game would magically work afterwards.

In my case, it only happened when I entered the first command. So, I just shrugged it off and restarted.

I hope this doesn't happen after anyone has entered more than one command, though!
Posts.HTML:

Quest games don't load at all online.

Looks like the Quest server is down.
